summary: This document is an email chain from March 2021 among US Attorney's Office (USANYS) personnel and a contractor, discussing the tagging of documents in the 'USvEpstein Relativity' database. The emails clarify the contents of two document batches (USAO-SDFL and OPR Materials) and request the creation of a 'Not Epstein Related' tag for a specific review project.

persons.name: Mane Villafana
persons.context: Mentioned in the file path for the 'OPR Materials' batch, indicating they are associated with the organization handling the document review.

events.title: Email discussion on Epstein database tagging
events.description: Email chain among USANYS personnel and a contractor discussing the tagging of documents in the 'USvEpstein Relativity' database, specifically requesting a 'Not Epstein Related' tag for a review batch.

keyFacts: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) was actively managing a document database named 'USvEpstein Relativity' as of March 2021.
Document review involved specific batches: 'BATCH003 - USAO-SDFL' (from the Southern District of Florida) and 'BATCH004 - OPR Materials' (from the Office of Professional Responsibility).
A request was made to create a 'Not Epstein Related' tag to categorize documents during the review process.
The email chain shows ongoing administrative and investigative work related to the Epstein case years after his death.
